p: The present study documented that about 58.5% of the districts in the region reported at least one FMD outbreak in 18â€‰years, which is lower than the 73% reported by Jemberu et al. [ 6]. The reason for the discrepancy between the current and the previous study could be due to the difference in the length of the study period and data sources. The previous study was based on short and recent period outbreak history collected from the districts while the present study was based on long period and based solely on official outbreak reports, which might be affected by underreporting.
